description:
The 4th Universe has it out for Master Roshi! Against multiple opponents, how will technique fare against power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Find Him! Death Match with an Invisible Attacker!!
Gefährliche Reflexionen! – Attacke des unsichtbaren Angreifers!
Mikiwamero! Sugatanaki Attacker to no Shitou!!
¡Buscadle! Duelo desigual contra un atacante invisible
見極めろ! 姿なきアタッカーとの死闘!!
